titles: The English ballance weighing the reasons of Englands present conjunction with France against the Dutch vvith some observes upon His Majesties declaration of liberty to tender consciences.
author: McWard, Robert, 1633?-1687.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II). --  His Majesties declaration to his loving subjects March 15th, 1672.
